items.question: What is your name?
items.hint: Start with 'My name is...' or 'I am...'

items.question: How are you?
items.hint: You can say 'I'm fine' or 'I'm good'

items.question: Where are you from?
items.hint: Say 'I am from...' followed by your country or city

items.question: What do you do?
items.hint: Say 'I am a...' followed by your job

items.question: Do you speak English?
items.hint: You can say 'Yes, a little' or 'I'm learning'

items.question: What time is it?
What day is it today?
items.hint: Say 'Today is...' followed by the day

items.question: Are you hungry?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I am' or 'No, I'm not'

items.question: What would you like to drink?
items.hint: Say 'I would like...' followed by a drink

items.question: Do you like coffee?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I do' or 'No, I don't'

items.question: How old are you?
items.hint: Say 'I am...' followed by your age

items.question: Where do you live?
items.hint: Say 'I live in...' followed by your city

items.question: Do you have any siblings?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I have...' or 'No, I don't have any'

items.question: What is your favorite color?
items.hint: Say 'My favorite color is...' followed by a color

items.question: What is your favorite food?
items.hint: Say 'My favorite food is...' followed by a food

items.question: Can you help me?
What is this?
items.hint: Say 'This is...' followed by the name

items.question: How much does this cost?
items.hint: Say 'It costs...' followed by the price

items.question: Do you have this in a different size?
items.hint: You can say 'What size do you need?'

items.question: Where is the bathroom?
items.hint: Give directions like 'It's on the right'

items.question: What are your hobbies?
items.hint: Say 'I like...' followed by your hobby

items.question: Do you like sports?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I like...' and mention a sport

items.question: What music do you like?
items.hint: Say 'I like...' followed by a music genre

items.question: What time do you wake up?
items.hint: Say 'I wake up at...' followed by the time

items.question: What time do you go to sleep?
items.hint: Say 'I go to sleep at...' followed by the time

items.question: Are you married?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I am' or 'No, I'm single'

items.question: Do you have children?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I have...' or 'No, not yet'

items.question: What is your phone number?
items.hint: Say 'My number is...' followed by digits

items.question: What is your email address?
items.hint: Say 'My email is...' spell it out

items.question: Is this seat taken?
items.questionIndonesian: Apakah kursi ini sudah ada yang duduk?

items.question: Can I borrow your pen?
What did you have for breakfast?
What will you have for dinner?
items.hint: Say 'I will have...' followed by food

items.question: Is the food spicy?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, it is' or 'No, it's not'

items.question: How is the weather today?
Did you sleep well?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, very well' or 'Not really'

items.question: Are you tired?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I am' or 'No, I'm fine'

items.question: Do you understand?
items.hint: Answer with 'Yes, I understand' or 'No, can you repeat?'

items.question: Can you speak slower?
What does this mean?
items.hint: Say 'It means...' followed by the meaning

items.question: How long have you been learning English?
items.questionIndonesian: Sudah berapa lama belajar bahasa Inggris?

items.question: What do you do in your free time?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang kamu lakukan di waktu luang?
items.hint: Say 'I like to...' followed by activity

items.question: Have you ever been abroad?
items.questionIndonesian: Apakah kamu pernah ke luar negeri?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I have been to...' or 'No, not yet'

items.question: Where would you like to travel?
items.hint: Say 'I would like to visit...' followed by a place

items.question: How was your weekend?
items.hint: Say 'It was...' and describe your weekend

items.question: What are your plans for today?
items.hint: Say 'I'm going to...' followed by your plan

items.question: Can you recommend a good restaurant?
items.hint: Say 'I recommend...' followed by restaurant name

items.question: What kind of food do you prefer?
items.questionIndonesian: Kamu lebih suka makanan jenis apa?
items.hint: Say 'I prefer...' followed by food type

items.question: How often do you exercise?
items.hint: Say how frequently like 'Twice a week'

items.question: What is your biggest goal?
items.hint: Say 'My goal is to...' followed by your goal

items.question: Do you prefer tea or coffee?
items.questionIndonesian: Kamu lebih suka teh atau kopi?
items.hint: Say 'I prefer tea' or 'I prefer coffee'

items.question: What is your favorite movie?
items.hint: Say 'My favorite movie is...' followed by movie name

items.question: What book are you reading?
items.questionIndonesian: Buku apa yang sedang kamu baca?
items.hint: Say 'I'm reading...' followed by book title

items.question: How do you get to work?
items.hint: Say 'I take...' or 'By...' followed by transport

items.question: How long is your commute?
items.hint: Say 'It takes about...' followed by duration

items.question: What do you like about your job?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang kamu suka dari pekerjaanmu?
items.hint: Say 'I like...' followed by aspect of work

items.question: What is the most challenging part of your job?
items.hint: Say 'The most challenging is...' followed by challenge

items.question: Are you available tomorrow?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I am' or 'Sorry, I'm busy'

items.question: Can we reschedule?
What time should we meet?
Would you like to join us for lunch?
items.hint: Say 'Sure, I'd love to' or 'Sorry, I can't'

items.question: What is your opinion on this?
items.hint: Say 'I think...' followed by your opinion

items.question: Do you agree with me?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I agree' or 'I have a different opinion'

items.question: What would you do differently?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang akan kamu lakukan berbeda?
items.hint: Say 'I would...' followed by what you'd change

items.question: How did you learn about us?
Is everything okay?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, everything is fine' or explain issue

items.question: Can I ask you something?
What do you think I should do?
items.questionIndonesian: Menurutmu apa yang harus saya lakukan?
items.hint: Say 'I think you should...' followed by advice

items.question: Have you tried Indonesian food?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I have tried...' or 'Not yet'

items.question: What is your favorite Indonesian dish?
items.hint: Say 'My favorite is...' followed by dish name

items.question: Where is the nearest ATM?
How do I get to the train station?
Is there a pharmacy nearby?
items.questionIndonesian: Apakah ada apotek di dekat sini?

items.question: What symptoms do you have?
When did it start?
Do you have any allergies?
items.hint: Say 'Yes, I'm allergic to...' or 'No, I don't have any'

items.question: Would you like a receipt?
Will that be cash or card?
Do you need a bag?
Is this on sale?
Why are you interested in this position?
items.questionIndonesian: Kenapa kamu tertarik dengan posisi ini?

items.question: What are your strengths?
items.hint: Say 'My strength is...' followed by skill

items.question: What are your weaknesses?
items.hint: Be honest but show growth mindset

items.question: Where do you see yourself in five years?
items.questionIndonesian: Di mana kamu melihat dirimu dalam lima tahun?

items.question: Tell me about a challenge you've faced.
items.questionIndonesian: Ceritakan tentang tantangan yang pernah kamu hadapi.
items.hint: Describe a challenge and how you handled it

items.question: How do you handle stress?
Do you prefer working alone or in a team?
items.questionIndonesian: Kamu lebih suka bekerja sendiri atau dalam tim?
items.hint: Say your preference and explain why

items.question: What motivates you?
How do you prioritize your tasks?
Can you give me an example?
acceptedAnswers: Let me give you an example

items.question: What would you do in this situation?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang akan kamu lakukan dalam situasi ini?
items.hint: Describe your approach step by step

items.question: How would you handle a difficult customer?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu menangani pelanggan yang sulit?

items.question: What are your salary expectations?
items.hint: Give a range or show flexibility

items.question: Do you have any questions for me?
items.questionIndonesian: Apakah kamu punya pertanyaan untuk saya?
items.hint: Ask a thoughtful question about the role

items.question: When can you start?
What do you know about our company?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang kamu ketahui tentang perusahaan kami?
items.hint: Share what you've learned about the company

items.question: How do you stay updated in your field?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu mengikuti perkembangan di bidangmu?

items.question: Describe your ideal work environment.
items.hint: Describe the environment you work best in

items.question: Have you ever had a disagreement with a coworker?
items.questionIndonesian: Pernahkah kamu berselisih dengan rekan kerja?

items.question: What's your biggest professional achievement?
Could you please clarify what you mean?
What are the main points of your presentation?
Do you have any concerns about this project?
items.questionIndonesian: Apakah kamu punya kekhawatiran tentang proyek ini?

items.question: What alternative solutions would you suggest?
items.questionIndonesian: Solusi alternatif apa yang akan kamu sarankan?

items.question: How should we proceed from here?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kita harus melanjutkan dari sini?

items.question: What resources do we need?
items.questionIndonesian: Sumber daya apa yang kita butuhkan?

items.question: When is the deadline?
Who is responsible for this task?
items.questionIndonesian: Siapa yang bertanggung jawab untuk tugas ini?

items.question: What are the risks involved?
How will we measure success?
What's your opinion on the current situation?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa pendapatmu tentang situasi saat ini?

items.question: How has your experience been so far?
What improvements would you suggest?
items.questionIndonesian: Perbaikan apa yang akan kamu sarankan?

items.question: Can you summarize the main points?
What lessons have you learned?
items.questionIndonesian: Pelajaran apa yang sudah kamu pelajari?

items.question: How would you describe your communication style?
acceptedAnswers: I would describe my style as

items.question: What do you value most in a workplace?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang paling kamu hargai di tempat kerja?

items.question: How do you approach problem-solving?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana pendekatan kamu dalam memecahkan masalah?

items.question: What makes a good leader?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang membuat pemimpin yang baik?

items.question: How do you handle criticism?
Could you elaborate on that point?
items.questionIndonesian: Bisakah kamu menjelaskan poin itu lebih lanjut?

items.question: What are the implications of this decision?
How would you justify this approach?
What factors should we consider?
items.questionIndonesian: Faktor apa yang harus kita pertimbangkan?

items.question: How would you address this challenge?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan mengatasi tantangan ini?

items.question: What are the long-term consequences?
How do you ensure quality in your work?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu memastikan kualitas dalam pekerjaanmu?

items.question: What's your strategy for this project?
How would you handle a conflict between team members?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu menangani konflik antar anggota tim?

items.question: What innovations have you implemented?
items.questionIndonesian: Inovasi apa yang sudah kamu implementasikan?

items.question: How do you balance competing priorities?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu menyeimbangkan prioritas yang bersaing?

items.question: What metrics are most relevant here?
items.questionIndonesian: Metrik apa yang paling relevan di sini?

items.question: How would you scale this solution?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan memperbesar solusi ini?

items.question: What contingency plans should we have?
items.questionIndonesian: Rencana cadangan apa yang harus kita miliki?

items.question: How do you maintain stakeholder engagement?
What assumptions are we making?
How would you optimize this process?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan mengoptimalkan proses ini?

items.question: What's your assessment of the situation?
How do you foster innovation in your team?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu mendorong inovasi di timmu?

items.question: What's the ROI on this initiative?
How do you ensure compliance?
What's your vision for the future?
How do you build trust with clients?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu membangun kepercayaan dengan klien?

items.question: What's your approach to risk management?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana pendekatan kamu terhadap manajemen risiko?

items.question: How do you drive continuous improvement?
What differentiates our approach?
How would you negotiate this deal?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan menegosiasikan kesepakatan ini?

items.question: What's your leadership philosophy?
How do you measure customer satisfaction?
What's your competitive advantage?
How would you present this to the board?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan mempresentasikan ini kepada dewan?

items.question: What market trends should we be aware of?
items.questionIndonesian: Tren pasar apa yang harus kita ketahui?

items.question: How do you ensure alignment across teams?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu memastikan keselarasan antar tim?

items.question: What's the best approach for this partnership?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa pendekatan terbaik untuk kemitraan ini?

items.question: How do you cultivate talent?
What's your contingency if this fails?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa rencana cadanganmu jika ini gagal?

items.question: How would you respond to this crisis?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan merespons krisis ini?

items.question: What governance structure do you recommend?
items.questionIndonesian: Struktur tata kelola apa yang kamu rekomendasikan?

items.question: How do you evaluate vendor proposals?
What's your approach to digital transformation?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana pendekatan kamu terhadap transformasi digital?

items.question: How do you build consensus?
What's your exit strategy?
How do you handle sensitive information?
What synergies do you see?
How would you restructure this department?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu akan merestrukturisasi departemen ini?

items.question: What's your due diligence process?
How do you maintain competitive intelligence?
What's your change management approach?
How do you balance short-term and long-term goals?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu menyeimbangkan tujuan jangka pendek dan jangka panjang?

items.question: What ethical considerations should we address?
items.questionIndonesian: Pertimbangan etis apa yang harus kita tangani?

items.question: How do you ensure transparency?
What's your approach to sustainability?
How do you handle ambiguity?
What would make this initiative successful?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang akan membuat inisiatif ini sukses?

items.question: How do you manage expectations?
What would you do differently if you could start over?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang akan kamu lakukan berbeda jika bisa mengulang?

items.question: How has this experience shaped you?
What advice would you give to your younger self?
items.questionIndonesian: Saran apa yang akan kamu berikan kepada dirimu yang lebih muda?

items.question: What's the most important lesson you've learned?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa pelajaran paling penting yang sudah kamu pelajari?

items.question: How do you define success?
What principles guide your decisions?
How do you maintain work-life balance?
What keeps you motivated?
How do you handle setbacks?
What's your vision for the next decade?
How do you contribute to your community?
What legacy do you want to leave?
items.questionIndonesian: Warisan apa yang ingin kamu tinggalkan?

items.question: What responsibility do we have to future generations?
items.questionIndonesian: Tanggung jawab apa yang kita miliki terhadap generasi mendatang?

items.question: How do you see technology shaping our future?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana menurutmu teknologi membentuk masa depan kita?

items.question: What makes a society flourish?
How should we address global challenges?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana seharusnya kita menangani tantangan global?

items.question: What role does education play in development?
items.questionIndonesian: Peran apa yang dimainkan pendidikan dalam pembangunan?

items.question: How can we promote understanding between cultures?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kita bisa mempromosikan pemahaman antar budaya?

items.question: What values should guide technological development?
items.questionIndonesian: Nilai apa yang harus memandu perkembangan teknologi?

items.question: How do you balance progress with tradition?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu menyeimbangkan kemajuan dengan tradisi?

items.question: What does leadership mean to you?
How can we build a more inclusive society?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kita bisa membangun masyarakat yang lebih inklusif?

items.question: What gives you hope for the future?
items.questionIndonesian: Apa yang memberimu harapan untuk masa depan?

items.question: How do you stay grounded during success?
items.questionIndonesian: Bagaimana kamu tetap membumi saat sukses?

items.question: What message would you like to share with the world?
items.questionIndonesian: Pesan apa yang ingin kamu sampaikan kepada dunia?
